B

Being - Class in actors
A representation of the Monster's and PC's in the Game.
Being(FlatMap) - Constructor for class actors.Being
Constructor giving the spawn location of any being.
Blizzard - Class in magic
Blizzard is a magic attack that does damage in a selected cell in the radius around the player
Blizzard() - Constructor for class magic.Blizzard
 
Bludgeon - Class in swag
 
Bludgeon() - Constructor for class swag.Bludgeon
 
BoardElements - Class in gameBoard
This class is the class that does the painting for the items on the gameboard.
BoardElements(ItemMap) - Constructor for class gameBoard.BoardElements
 
BOTS - Class in server
 
BOTS(WorldState, LinkedBlockingQueue<GladdosEvent>, Map<String, Being>) - Constructor for class server.BOTS
Constructer for the bots to start all the bots on one thread.
bp - Variable in class gui.GameBoard
BoardPanel is an inner class that does the painting for the main gameboard
bp - Variable in class gui.MapCreate
 
Broadcaster - Class in server
This thread is established on the server to contain every client's output stream.
Broadcaster(Server) - Constructor for class server.Broadcaster
Constructs a new Broadcast Thread Object.
broadcastUpdate(GladdosUpdate) - Method in class server.Broadcaster
Sends a server update out to all of the currently connected clients.

BuyEvent - Class in events
 
BuyEvent(int, Swag) - Constructor for class events.BuyEvent
Constructer for the BuyEvent that will initialize the Swag item that is being bought and the ID of the buyer.
BuyUpdate - Class in updates
 
BuyUpdate(int, Swag) - Constructor for class updates.BuyUpdate
